entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:57 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 1:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -42.6°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
